messages.content:
📌 Visual Vocabulary (Classes 6–8)
🗓️ Tuesday, 19th August 2025 | ⏰ 9:30 AM to 11:30 AM
🎯 Format: Vocabulary Word Collage Poster

ℹ️ Students create a visual collage illustrating 3 selected vocabulary words with pictures, cutouts, drawings, and captions.

📖 Sample Rules:
• Individual event.
• A3 sheet to be provided; only dry materials allowed.
• Each word must have a heading, image, and 1-line caption.
...

🏆 Awards: Top 3 Posters, Creativity Award...
👥 Visual Vocabulary is open to students in 6–8.
